The Saiga-12 is a Kalashnikov pattern, 12 gauge combat shotgun, manufactured by Izhmash. The Saiga-12 is recognizable by its Kalashnikov design with the large lever safety on the right side of the receiver, the optic mounting rail on the left and the large top mounted dust cover held in place by the rear of the recoil spring assembly. Earning respect in the Zone for its lethality, it is intended for engaging targets at short range (50 metres or less) or in confined spaces.
 This particular weapon has a drum magazine, and has received changes to its gas system.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All Red Dot scopes for Dovetail mount.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: PBS-1 suppressor

A Saiga-12 modified by the manufacturer at the request of the Ministry of Science and its personel. The expeditions of the ecologists puts both the researchers and their escorts to higher risk of encountering dangerous mutants. With suggestions from both their guards and mercenaries, simple but effective modifications were made to a basic Saiga-12 to improve its basic capabilities, giving it an edge over other shotguns against aggressive wildlife.
 This particular weapon has a drum magazine, and has received changes to its gas system.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All Red Dot scopes for Dovetail mount.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: PBS-1 suppressor

A short barreled variant of the KS-12, itself a variant of the Saiga-12 semiautomatic shotgun, produced by Kalashnikov USA to work around the US ban on Russian guns. The weapon has a Picatinny rail for use with various types of sights, and includes a higher capacity magazine.
 This model has a new type of trigger mechanism, which allows you to fire a two rounds burst, and both a dovetail mount and Picatinny rail for use with various types of sights. It has been provided to members of ISG research teams to protect themselves from mutants.
 This particular weapon has a drum magazine, and has received changes to its gas system.

 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All Red Dot scopes for picatinny/weaver.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: NATO suppressor
